titles: A discourse of monarchy more particularly of the imperial crowns of England, Scotland, and Ireland according to the ancient, common, and statute-laws of the same : with a close from the whole as it relates to the succession of His Royal Highness James Duke of York.
author: Wilson, John, 1626-1696.
publisher: Printed by M.C. for Jos. Hindmarsh,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Great Britain --  Kings and rulers --  Succession.
